title: Guarding the Stallion
description: Carter Simmons has done everything in his power to save the love of his life, when the scornful people of a small Wyoming town convict Stetson Carthswaite of first-degree murder and place him on a fast-track to the electric chair. Stetson sits locked in prison, unable to flee, tormented by fellow inmates, while Carter faces a choice to betray Stetson or possibly find a way to save him. Will Carter choose to save Stetson, even if it means he betrays Stetson's trust? Carter must act fast before it's too late. Read on to find out the outcome!This 7000+ word short story contains graphic descriptions of sexual liaisons between a hot alpha male cowboy and a fearful, yet loyal young 23-year old .Total Page ~50 pages. Please note this novella includes two complementary novels with your purchase, with links to other stories you might find interesting.
author: Candy Collins
